document.full_text: four of fifa's six biggest sponsors raised pressure on sepp blatter to accept reform of soccer's scandal-torn governing body, as the president welcomed delegates due to re-elect him with jugglers and folk dancing.
document.title: fifa's blatter juggles sponsor pressure, voters
lines_and_colors: four of fifa's six biggest sponsors raised pressure on sepp blatter to accept reform of soccer's scandal-torn governing body, as the president welcomed delegates due to re-elect him with jugglers and folk dancing.
